item.title: Syncing articles between Readwise Reader and Pocket
item.description: I’m a big reader and I’ve used Kindles to read for a long time. I now have a Oasis (best one there is) and Paperwhite (2021). What I don’t like is the lock-in, but what I also like is the ecosystem. There’s always tradeoffs. Recently Amazons competitor Kobo released colour e-ink devices, with stylus support. Their styluses, unlike Kindle devices, can write directly in books (not in notes as the Kindle Scribe does).
